mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{regDate}, #{viewCnt})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regDate desc
